name: Four Walls Of The Boiler Room
name_original: Four Walls Of The Boiler Room
description: You are locked in a boiler room doomed to live the same day again and again. But every time something is different in the room! Navigate with your flashlight and zoom and try to find the passcode which will unlock the door to your safety. A horror game created for Ludum Dare 47 - Stuck In A Loop (Compo).
